source_quote: notice that quick bullish reaction after the SSLQ – 1 sweep, that’s another example of when we take some quick scalp plays against the Daily momentum

signature.condition: IF price sweeps SSLQ (Sell Side Liquidity - Quarter level) and shows quick bullish reaction
signature.action: THEN consider quick scalp plays against the daily momentum
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught SSLQ sweeps as entry triggers

source_quote: After the bullish retracement happens and price pulls into the FVG, we’re back on the run targeting deeper SSLQ levels

signature.condition: IF price pulls into FVG after bullish retracement
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught FVG entries with liquidity targets

source_quote: at this point we're deep into the Discount side of the dealing range, so we step on the sidelines from here what comes to short positions and wait till price starts building on the bullish side again

signature.condition: IF price is deep into Discount side of dealing range
signature.action: THEN step aside from short positions and wait for bullish structure to build
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught dealing range positioning rules
